text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
You've met some wonderful horsegirls! 
Before we get to training, look at this!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
I will also be explaining 
the support card gacha.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Let's switch over to the support gacha!
